text:
e="preserve">Peter Wayne Goode Jr. (August 20, 1937 – October 3, 2020) was an American politician. He was born in St. Louis. A member of the Democrat, he was elected to the Missouri House of Representatives for district 33 in 1962. In 1984, he was elected to the Missouri State Senate. He retired in 2005.
Goode died of leukemia on October 3, 2020, in St. Louis at the age of 83.
